1.0.name: wordpress/wpcommand
1.0.description:
The WP Command and Control WordPress Plugin works with WP Command and Control to enable you to remotely manage all your WordPress sites.

Features

  • Track all your WordPress sites from one place.
  • Track the WordPress version each site is running and easily update.
  • Track all your plugins and themes and 1 click update them.
  • Back up your database and files.

Support

You can email us at support@wpcommandcontrol.com for support.
